### variable overview
hej 
```{r}
long_dat %>% 
  group_by(Day, Absense_Score) %>% 
  summarise("Count" = n())

long_dat %>% 
  group_by(Absense_Score) %>% 
  summarise("Count" = n())

long_dat %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Day)) + 
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
  facet_wrap(~ Absense_Score) +
  labs(x = "Day", 
       y = "Frequency of Observations",
       title= "Absense Score") +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Blues") +
  geom_text(stat='count', aes(label=..count..), vjust=-0.5, size = 1.8) +
  theme_bw()

```

#### OF THE DUMMY CODE:
```{r}
long_dat %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Day)) + 
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
  facet_wrap(~ sickness) +
  labs(x = "Day", 
       y = "Frequency of Observations",
       title= "Sickness") +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Blues") +
  theme_bw()

long_dat %>% 
  mutate(sick = as.factor(sickness)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = sick)) + 
  geom_bar(position = "dodge") +
  facet_wrap(~ Day) +
  labs(x = "sickness", 
       y = "Frequency of Observations",
       title= "Sickness by Days") +
  geom_text(stat='count', aes(label=..count..), vjust=-0.5, size = 1.8) +
  theme_bw()
```
